text: Man from the Restaurant () is a 1927 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Пестрое лекарство из искусствГосударевы художестваИ вновь «Чеховские дни» It stars Michael Chekhov, Vera Malinovskaya, and Ivan Koval- Samborsky. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1927 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Man from the Restaurant
